pages.title: Extractor
pages.text: Extractor is a device that allows extraction of concentrated substances from liquid mixture.You can get extracts of several plants: adonis, bergenia, calendula, white nymphaea.Fire the extractor with any lighter and right-click with a plant on it.Wait until the process is over and take out the extract with a glass bottle.
* P.S. New recipes may be added when the mod updates, so you may find new recipes on the next page:
* Smashed coconut pulp --> wax  * Icy chalkstick --> wax   * Soy beans paste --> wax
